title: Bugsplat on Login
body: So I keep getting Bugsplat on login since today. Any idea what the issue is and how I can fix it?

replies.body: Anyone managed to log in yet?
Nope, I've initiated a full repair twice but still haven't been able to.

Please zip and send your lol client logs to ocelivereports@riotgames.com, and let's see what's going on.
The default path for the LeagueClient Logs folder is: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\LeagueClient Logs
Thanks for the reply finally! Have sent my logs.
Thanks for that. I'm just getting a little more info now to determine next steps.

I even reinstalled the game but the same stuff is still happening, I'll try and send you guys whatever you need for data but it
s pretty frustrating not being able to log on since like 8:00 in the morning.

It's hugely frustrating, I can imagine.

If you'd like to send us more info, check out the steps I gave to The Unkindled for collecting and sending us the crash dumps.
I'll do that, godspeed in getting to the bottom of this.
Thank you. Can you please try logging in now and let me know how it goes?
I'm in, thanks for the help! i'll let you know if there's any other issues.

Awesome! I'm seeing the others logging in too so it seems like the patch worked.
Thanks so much for your patience and assistance.

Ok, we have a potential fix going out tomorrow but it's not 100% certain to fix the problem. So we're going to need to collect crash dumps to keep digging into this until we know it's solved. Please follow these steps when the bugsplat appears but before the client is closed:

- Start Task Manager
- Find "League of Legends (32 bit)" under the Background processes section (not Apps section) on the Processes tab
- Right click it and select create dump file. This will create the dump and tell you where it is stored (you can copy+paste that file path)
- Find the file (will be a DMP File type) and reduce its size by Right click > Send To > Compressed (zipped) folder
- Upload this compressed file to a google drive and share this with ocelivereports@riotgames.com. Alternatively, you can [open a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and attach the file to the ticket.
So there's no chance of the problem being fixed for tonight? I have send the DMP files. thanks for getting back to us.
Hey there, the patch went out this morning, but I have a hunch that it is only treating loading screen crashes and not login crashes. Can you please test and let me know how it goes today?
Unfortunately, I don't believe so. I'll pass the DMP file on to the devs, thank you.
